A-R-K-S-K-Z2010 close the program first then use the crack. the keys will only when you copy all files from the crack folder
A-R-K-S-K-Z2010  first close the program then copy all the files from the crack folder into the main directory of the program.

A little advice that could help many, Ma-Config, awesome in updating drivers and costs nothing. Thanks uploader, your torrent is perfect but ma-config still is better for me than driver-not-so-genius.

To chop007 - Ma-config, while interesting, isn't as complete as Driver Ge Pro; it also just gives you a very small list of drivers without saying which need updated...or not. Still, much like the old Evergreen program, now Aida, it renders a lot of information about your system. If you're looking for a no-brainer near-automatic driver updater, this is it.
